name: City Driving Test Car Parking Simulator - Real Weather Racing Sim Run Race Games
name_original: City Driving Test Car Parking Simulator - Real Weather Racing Sim Run Race Games
description:
Drive a MASSIVE range of City Cars, Exotic Sports Cars, Industrial Trucks and a School Bus through dynamically changing weather conditions! It’s not all Sun, Sun, Sun here… there’s also Rain, Sleet and Snow to deal with!

16 VEHICLES TO COLLECT
Collect & Drive SIXTEEN Cool Cars. From Caravans & Sports cars to 4x4’s, Supercars & Trucks… there’s something for everyone’s taste, ready to be driven on the increasingly difficult missions. Can you pass all the Driving Tests in the best possible time?

DYNAMIC WEATHER
Experience Sun, Rain, Sleet and Snow as you drive around the realistic city. Strangely, it’s 4 Seasons all in one day here!

COMPETE ONLINE
Show off your Best Times with the whole World! Can you climb the ranks to reach the top of the leaderboards?

CONTROLLER SUPPORT
Connect your MFi Game Controller for the ultimate driving experience.

FUN IN THE SUN
Unlock fun extra Game Modes via optional In-App Purchases including a Fun Mode, Easy Mode and Invincible Mode! Each has separate GameCenter leaderboards to make for totally fair competition!


GAME FEATURES

▶ Collect 16 Stunning Cars & Trucks in various categories. Each vehicle has unique realistic handling
▶ Unlock & Drive your way through 60+ Exciting Parking & Driving Tests
▶ Customisable control methods (buttons, tilt, steering wheel or MFi game controller)
▶ Enhanced MFi Game Controller Support, for the ultimate driving control!
▶ Multiple views (including Drivers Eye view with real-time mirrors*)
▶ Extra Fun & Easier Game Modes available as optional In-App Purchases
▶ Runs on anything from or better than the iPhone 4, iPad 2, iPad Mini & iPod Touch (4th Generation)
